text: Heinz Oberhummer (19 May 1941 - 24 November 2015) was an Austrian physicist and skeptic. He was born in Bischofshofen and raised in Obertauern, Austria. Oberhummer was professor emeritus of Theoretical Physics at the Atominstitut of the Vienna University of Technology. His main research area was nucleosynthesis. Oberhummer died of pneumonia in Vienna, Austria, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Articles of Heinz Oberhummer in arxiv.org * Kann das alles Zufall sein? - Geheimnisvolles Universum, Ecowin-Verlag, 2008; Award for "Best Popular Science Book in Austria 2009" * Science Busters * Cinema and Science (CISCI) * Neue Erkenntnisse zur Entstehung der Grundlagen f√ºr Leben Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Austrian academics Category:Austrian physicists Category:People from Salzburgerland
title: Heinz Oberhummer
